name: Tik tak toe - an addiction
description:
Tik Tak Toe Free, is the  best free challenging yet addicting board game for iPhone and iPad, casual game of naughts and crosses which you had surely enjoyed on your notebooks in your schools or at home with friends and relatives.

Tik Tak Toe Free being liked and appreciated almost from all over the world, just read What our users say about our game.

Nettes Spiel :) Das Spiel macht Spaß, schöne Grafiken - allerdings fände ich es gut wenn die Ki nicht dauernd gewinnen würde [PowerPG from Germany]

Игра средне, но рекламу грузить после каждой Игры это перебор! [Grettasstorm from Russia]

Awesome,This game is very user friendly and suitable for all ages. The fast quick games make it very addictive. A great way to pass some time.[Wadeos22 from Australia]

Tuyệt vời, Game rất hay. Khuyến khích các bạn chơi thử. Rất tuyệt vời không thể rời mắt khỏi màn hình [Johnmac32517 from Vietnam]

Simple and good classic tic tac toe, Easy to see and use with big icons. Computer moves nearly instantenous. Good performance! [Btantra from Singapore]

Fun playing, Really fun app and the AI is impressive. [Sayed Bachtaryshev from Belgium]

Cool version of the classic! Nice rendition of the classic game. Super user friendly!
[Lalaland009 from Canada]

Nice game, Really good tic tac toe game! Good job developer [badyl111 from Poland]

Don’t Waste paper, pencils and erasers now, just get Tik Tak Toe Free installed on your iPhone or iPad and enjoy playing one of the best free board game ever designed and developed for iTunes App Store.

How To Play Tik Tak Toe Free?

Choose your Symbol '0' or 'X' to Play with, from 'Change Symbol Options' 

Select Game mode to Play Vs Computer or Vs Human.

Player who draw 3 in a row or 3 in a column first wins.

Smileys appears to confirm Which Player has won, and also appears on Draw game.

Sounds played to enjoy and appreciating your winning against computer.

Play Tik Tak Toe Free with Friends giving turn to them, Or enjoy beating computer with your intelligence and presence of mind with a simple trick.

What's unique in this Free TicTacToe Game?

35 Beautiful Skins:

Choose beautiful Tik Tak Toe Skins from Options menu and enjoy playing Tik Tak Toe Free without getting bored with the same Skin(0 & X Symbol).

10 skins, available by default Freely with first app install.

***Amazing New Tik Tak Toe Free - Play & Win Edition:
Now Users can also Win Coins and Unlock Skins against those Coins. The more you play the more you win and save bucks to purchase Skins

Unlock a Skin for 25 Coins:
Play & Win 5 Games in a Row to get 25 Coins

Unlock 2 Skins for 100 Coins:
Play & Win 5 more Games in a Row to get 100 Coins

Unlock 3 Skins for 375 Coins:
Play & Win 15 more Games in a Row to get 375 Coins

Unlock 8 more Skins for 600 Coins:
Play & Win 20 more Games in a Row to get 600 Coins

Play Against Friends: Play Tik Tak Toe Free with Friends in "Vs Human" mode. Hand over to your friend or partner on their turn to play with them.

Change Player Name:  User can also customize their Player Names from options menu.

Sounds:  Game Sounds added and are played during gameplay on selecting options, Users Turn, Win, Lose and Draw Game

Smileys: Smileys appear to confirm Draw Game or when Computer Wins or Player

If you love our game please Rate it on iTunes and Share with friends to let them enjoy the board on their iPhone and iPad too.  If you have any issue you may contact and resolve via Tik Tak Toe Free app support page mentioned here.

Watch Demo Video: https://youtu.be/OYkcmV1cmwA
